meanings.sent1: The unsalted crackers were perfect for my friend who can't have salt.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unsalted butter for baking because I can control the saltiness.
meanings.sent3: The unsalted popcorn tasted bland until I added some seasoning.
meanings.sent4: Her unsalted tears flowed freely as she watched the sad movie.
meanings.sent5: The unsalted soup lacked flavor, so I added some herbs to enhance it.

meanings.sent1: The unsalted fries were a healthier option on the menu.
meanings.sent2: I always choose unsalted nuts for snacking to avoid too much salt.
meanings.sent3: The unsalted steak seemed naked without its usual seasoning.
meanings.sent4: His unsalted remarks were refreshing in a conversation full of sarcasm.
meanings.sent5: The unsalted pretzels tasted plain, but some people prefer them that way.
